com.skobbler.ngx.search

Class SKMultiStepSearchSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.search.SKMultiStepSearchSettings

  • public class SKMultiStepSearchSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores input parameters for a step by step search.
    Version:
    2.4

    • Method Detail

      • getListLevel

        public SKSearchManager.SKListLevel getListLevel()
        Return the list level. Describes what list needs to be displayed (e.g. country, state, city, street).
        Returns:
        list level.

      • setListLevel

        public void setListLevel(SKSearchManager.SKListLevel listLevel)
        Set list level.
        Parameters:
        listLevel - describes what list needs to be displayed (e.g. country, state, city, street).

      • getOfflinePackageCode

        public java.lang.String getOfflinePackageCode()
        Return the code of the country where the search is executed. When streets or house numbers are requested, this should be the code of the offline package retrieved in the previous search.
        Returns:
        the code of the country where the search is executed

      • setOfflinePackageCode

        public void setOfflinePackageCode(java.lang.String offlinePackageCode)
        Sets the code of the country where the search is executed. When streets or house numbers are requested, this should be the code of the offline package retrieved in the previous search.
        Parameters:
        offlinePackageCode -

      • getParentIndex

        public long getParentIndex()
        Return parent index.
        Returns:
        parent index - where the search will take place. (e.g. for a street this will contain the index of the city. The index is received from previous search)

      • setParentIndex

        public void setParentIndex(long parentIndex)
        Set parent index.
        Parameters:
        parentIndex - where the search will take place. (e.g. for a street this will contain the index of the city. The index is received from previous search)

      • getSearchTerm

        public java.lang.String getSearchTerm()
        Search term.
        Returns:
        search term .It can be used to filter the list. It should be empty for all the results

      • setSearchTerm

        public void setSearchTerm(java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Set search termn.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - it can be used to filter the list. It should be empty for all the results

        public int getMaxSearchResultsNumber()
        Return maximum numbers of search results.
        Returns:
        maximum number of search result.

        Returns:
        the language in which the search results are returned.

      • setSearchLanguage

        public void setSearchLanguage(SKMaps.SKLanguage searchLanguage)
        Sets the language in which the search results are returned. Default values is SKMaps.SKLanguage.LANGUAGE_EN
        Parameters:
        searchLanguage - new language in which the search results are returned
